title: "Balance is out of control.... Season 6 is the worst thing ever.... Dynamic Que sucks"
body:
http://imgur.com/8Hhnc4q

Stop complaining.

The snowballing has died down exponentially. 
A single dragon could turn the game around for your team. Death timers are down the way they should be.

And yes, before you say anything, there are OP picks but every patch has OP picks. Zed has always been on top, Viegar used to be "strong" (because he one shot an AP champion with his ult in LCS) and people complained about him until rito nerfed him, and a variety of other champions are the same way.

Dynamic Que is a problem but we don't need 500 posts on the boards adding nothing to the conversation. The past few weeks have been *full* of QQ about Dynamic Que (which is a problem) but we don't need to keep saying the same thing about 4 man premades, or that we never get our preferred role, or that support is always chosen over the other. 

Riot knows what is wrong with Dynamic Que and are working on a fix. They have said this a few times. People need to stop complaining about dynamic que when Riot knows.

Stop adding the same thing to the conversation.

#Unpopular Opinions

Yes for the issue still exists. The complaints should not stop, untill the issue is fixed.

This is a very exagerated comparsion but I feel i must make it.

Lets take the black equal rights movement in the MLK days

One can say

"we allready had a war for them, why are black people still complaining?"

Yes we had a war, but problems still existed, so black people had to keep "complaining".

If black people stopped protesting after the war and simply settled for being "free", than the problems before them would still exist. The government knows the problem exists, but they would of done nothing to stop the problem for no one is "complaining".

Do not stop complaining untill the problem is resolved. Work to resolve the problem, don't just half ass it.
Yes. Otherwise we get companies like EA running things

>Riot knows what is wrong with Dynamic Que and are working on a fix. They have said this a few times. People need to stop complaining about dynamic que when Riot knows.

Don't trust Riot; that's how we got stuck with DQ in the first place. People looked at it, said it was bullshit, and Riot told us right to our faces that it's okay if DQ is a little broken for solo people because SoloQ would be coming back. Turns out, they were lying. What's worse, they knew they were lying. They never had any intention of releasing a SoloQ; since if they did it would be here after all this time. They blew smoke up our asses to get us to shut up and stop complaining.

Players have short memories, but that particular burn is still _very_ fresh in their minds. Every complaint thread isn't just saying "Dynamic Queue is trash" it also says (metaphorically) "We remember how you tricked us, it's not happening again". Every time you complain about DQ, it keeps Riot honest by forcing them to confront the issue, even if they immediately click away from the discussion.

Don't feel sorry for Riot when they're constantly haunted by their own dishonesty. They brought this on themselves, and they deserve every single topic that gets made reminding them of it.

You aren't the only one but I only have one upvote
Snowballing dying down is stupid to me. If your team gets ahead, you deserve a lead. I *hate* all the bs comeback mechanics they've added to the game.

If a team has a terrible late game and completely throws the game, do they deserve to win? No. But they used to be able to because winions were pushing so hard that they could do whatever and still win.

Thats not what happens and you know it. I'm talking about leads evaporating because of 1 mistake. I'm talking about not being punished for playing poorly. I'm talking about people being babied back into the game because they died twice in lane and cant figure out that maybe they shouldnt keep trying to fight the enemy that 3 levels above them now.

As far as other lanes on your team losing, sorry to break it to you but league is not a single player game. If playing 5v5 isnt your thing you should try a different game
